steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters valid email and password
the user clicks the login button
the user should be redirected to the account dashboard
the user is not logged in
the user is on the home page
the user selects a product from the product list
the user navigates to the product details page
the product is available
the user adds the product to the cart
the user navigates to the cart page

elements.name: Proceed to checkout as guest user

steps.name: the user proceeds to checkout
the user chooses guest checkout
user navigate to checkout page
the checkout page should display the correct product and price details
the user fills the all the checkout details
the user accepts the terms and conditions
the user clicks the continue button
the user should be able to see the confirm order page
the user confirms the order
the user navigates to the success page
user click continue button
the user is logged in

elements.name: Add a product to the cart from the product details page

steps.name: the user is on the home page
the user selects a product from the product list
the user navigates to the product details page
the product is available
the user adds the product to the cart
the user navigates to the cart page
the product should appear in the cart with the correct details
the user is logged in
the user is on the home page
the user selects a product from the product list
the user navigates to the product details page
the product is available

elements.name: Proceed to checkout by Buy Now

steps.name: the user click the buy now button
user navigate to checkout page
the checkout page should display the correct product and price details
user pick existing address
the user accepts the terms and conditions
the user clicks the continue button
the user should be able to see the confirm order page
the user confirms the order
the user navigates to the success page
user click continue button
the user is logged in
the user is on the home page
the user selects a product from the product list
the user navigates to the product details page
the product is available
the user adds the product to the cart
the user navigates to the cart page

elements.name: Remove a product from the cart

steps.name: the user removes the product from the cart
the product should no longer be displayed in the cart
the user is logged in
the user is on the home page
the user selects a product from the product list
the user navigates to the product details page
the product is available
the user adds the product to the cart
the user navigates to the cart page
the user proceeds to checkout
